level.heading: ELECTRONIC FILING OF PLEADINGS AND OTHER DOCUMENTS (§ 27-400)

level.text: All pleadings, motions, memoranda of law, orders, or other documents may be filed electronically through the Board’s designated vendor, CourtLink Corporation (“Vendor”), which can be contacted online at www.courtlink.com. Documents may be filed as either E Documents or E Images.
Authority: District of Columbia Procurement Practices Act of 1985, as amended, D.C. Code §§ 2-309.01 through 2-309.8 (2001).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 2078 (March 8, 2002); as amended by Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 52 DCR 4782 (May 20, 2005) [EXPIRED].
